acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle constructors with generic arrays during Pojo instantiation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleConstructorsWithGenericArraysDuringPojoInstantiation

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type YH_rd43S1k
